solution.text:
TSA of the arena= SA of 5 faces of a cube - area of the circle cut out + CSA of a hemisphere
CSA of the hemisphere is given by \(2 \times \pi \times r^2\)
we have diameter of the hemisphere=side of the cube=_{j}_\(\Rightarrow\)r=\(\frac {_{j}_}2=_{{Decimal('0.5')*j}}_\)
therefore area of a hemisphere=\(2 \times \pi \times _{{Decimal('0.5')*j}}_^2=_{{trunc(2*pi_val*Decimal('0.25')*j*j,2)}}_\)
Now area of a cuboid=\(5 \times side^2\)
side of the cube=\(s=_{j}_\)
Therefore area of the cube=\(5 \times _{j}_^2\)
\(\Rightarrow _{{5*j*j}}_\)
area of the circle on the top face=\(\pi \times r^2=_{{trunc(pi_val*Decimal('0.25')*j*j,2)}}_\)
TSA of the arena= SA of the cube - area of the circle cut out + CSA of a hemisphere=\(_{{5*j*j}}_-_{{trunc(pi_val*Decimal('0.25')*j*j,2)}}_+_{{trunc(pi_val*Decimal('0.25')*j*j*2,2)}}_\)
\(\Rightarrow _{{trunc(5*j*j-pi_val*Decimal('0.25')*j*j+pi_val*Decimal('0.25')*j*j*2,2)}}_\)
